text:
Hi Team,
We have a limit for HubDB 10 dynamic pages using the same HubDB table.
In case more than 10 dynamic pages what is the solutions let me know
We r building CMS website we have bunch of products needs to retrieved from PIM Salyeslayer and displayed in the website

OK so I think I know what’s going on here.  The doc says “Page limit: 10 dynamic pages using the same HubDB table.”

What it means is that you can only have 10 “regular” pages that has “Dynamic Pages: Data Source” set to the same dynamic-page-enabled table.

It doesn’t mean you can only have 10 dynamically-generated pages.
It can probably be better worded.
